itemDescription: A dull blade dropped by a missing chef.

Key.itemDescription: This key belongs to a Lady Capulet. Used to open her secret dia- *ahem* journal.

Journal.itemDescription: The inscription reads "This diary belongs to Lady Capulet of the Capulet family. Any trespassing eyes will be beheaded."

Bread.itemDescription: Stale bread bought by the cook at a cheap price. Don't expect better for dinner.

Gemstone.itemDescription: A mythical and luminous gem that holds powers to unlock a gate of some sort.

Hammer.itemDescription: A newly bought tool by the groundskeeper. Make sure he doesn't find out you have it.

Shotgun.itemDescription: A gun with a few bullets. Every shot is fatal. You've been warned.

Burrito.itemDescription: A handheld wrap with carne asada, black beans, brown rice and vegetables.
